title: The Best Friend, Boyfriend Theory
description: I am speechless, his words cut through me like a knife through my heart I donâ€™t know what has happened to my best friend but I don't like him very much right now.Becky has yet again fallen in love with the wrong man. This time however she has fallen for her best friend JJ. Will she tell him how she feels? Will they get together or will her feelings ruin their friendship? Can it ever work with a friend or should best friends stay just that? Let's put the theory to the test. Becky's life is far from boring, follow her on her journey and go through the highs and lows with her and root for the man you love!
author: Laura Lawrence
